body_html:
My personal vote would be: make comments public, and let a mentor have their own notepad to make notes.
This is part of my ongoing quest to let every web app in the world give you a space to make notes. :donquichote: :windmills: 😂

body:
My personal vote would be: make comments public, and let a mentor have their own notepad to make notes.
This is part of my ongoing quest to let every web app in the world give you a space to make notes. :donquichote: :windmills:  😂
